item.title: 受关税影响，Tapestry 预测年度利润低于预期
item.description: Tapestry 周四预测的年度利润低于预期，因为这家蔻驰手提包制造商预计关税导致的成本上升将打击其利润率，这使得其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 17%。【原文：Tapestry forecast annual profit below estimates on Thursday, as the Coach handbag maker expects higher costs due to tariff to hit its margins, sending its shares down 17% in premarket trading.】

item.title: VinFast 创始人拟再注资 15 亿美元以换取研发资产
item.description: VinFast 的创始人 Pham Nhat Vuong 已同意以 15.2 亿美元的价格收购电动汽车制造商的研发部门，这是他为这家亏损的越南公司注入的最新一笔现金，该公司正努力在 2026 年底之前实现收支平衡。【原文：VinFast's founder Pham Nhat Vuong has agreed to buy the EV maker's research and development arm for $1.52 billion, his latest cash injection into the loss-making Vietnamese company as it strives to break even by the end of 2026.】

item.title: 美联储宽松政策押注进入白热化
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 独家报道Meta 的人工智能规则让机器人与孩子们进行 "感性 "聊天，并提供虚假医疗信息
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司的一份内部文件详细说明了聊天机器人的行为政策，允许该公司的人工智能作品 "与儿童进行浪漫或感性的对话"，生成虚假的医疗信息，并帮助用户争辩黑人 "比白人笨"。【原文：An internal Meta Platforms document detailing policies on chatbot behavior has permitted the company’s artificial intelligence creations to “engage a child in conversations that are romantic or sensual,” generate false medical information and help users argue that Black people are “dumber than white people.”】

item.title: 哪些国家屏蔽了 WhatsApp？
item.description: 俄罗斯周三成为最新一个限制部分 WhatsApp 通话的国家，指责 Meta 旗下平台在欺诈和恐怖主义案件中未能共享信息。【原文：Russia on Wednesday became the latest country to restrict some WhatsApp calls, accusing the Meta-owned platform of failing to share information in fraud and terrorism cases.】

item.title: 迪尔第三季度利润下降
item.description: 农业设备制造商迪尔公司（Deere & Co）周四公布，受需求低迷和美国关税影响，第三季度利润下降。【原文：Farm-equipment maker Deere & Co reported a lower third-quarter profit on Thursday, hurt by muted demand and headwinds from U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 华尔街稳步上扬后期货暂停，数据成为焦点
item.description: 继华尔街本周的强劲走势之后，美国股指期货周四表现平淡，投资者在等待新的经济数据，以衡量美联储下月的货币政策决定。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Thursday following a strong run on Wall Street this week and investors awaited fresh economic data to gauge the Federal Reserve's monetary policy verdict next month.】

item.title: 特朗普推动的加密货币狂潮引发华尔街 IPO 热潮
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统第二届政府的友好政策将全球加密货币价值推高至创纪录的 4.2 万亿美元，受此推动，美国加密货币公司经过多年的观望后，正排队等待上市。【原文：After years of sitting on the sidelines, U.S. crypto companies are lining up to go public, buoyed by friendly policies under President Donald Trump's second administration that have pushed the value of global cryptocurrencies to a record $4.2 trillion.】

item.title: 电子商务需求稳定，中国剑网季度营收超预期
item.description: 中国电子商务巨头京东周四公布的季度营收超出市场预期，表明在降价和政府补贴的推动下，消费者在京东平台上的消费势头强劲。【原文：Chinese e-commerce giant JD.com beat market estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, signaling resilient consumer spending on its platform, fueled by price cuts and government subsidies.】

item.title: 瑞安航空称夏季订票依然强劲，票价保持不变
item.description: 瑞安航空公司首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周四在接受采访时说，整个欧洲的需求非常强劲，他对实现夏季目标 "相当乐观"。【原文：Ryanair is seeing very strong demand across Europe and is "reasonably optimistic" about hitting its summer targets, Chief Executive Michael O'Leary said in an interview on Thursday.】

item.title: 贸易协议达成前，英国 6 月对美商品出口降至 3 年低点
item.description: 周四公布的官方数据显示，6月份英国对美国的商品出口跌至三年多来的最低水平，该数据显示了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最初的进口关税闪电战所造成的打击。【原文：British goods exports to the United States fell to their lowest level in more than three years in June, according to official data published on Thursday that showed the hit from U.S. President Donald Trump's initial import tariff blitz.】

item.title: 瑞士黄金业对斯沃琪老板的美国黄金税提案提出警告
item.description: 瑞士黄金业周四对钟表制造商斯沃琪（Swatch）老板提出的对出口到美国的黄金征税以报复美国对瑞士征收关税的建议表示怀疑。【原文：Switzerland's gold industry on Thursday voiced scepticism about a proposal by the boss of watchmaker Swatch to introduce a levy on gold exports to the United States in retaliation for U.S. tariffs on Switzerland.】

item.title: 由于需求降温，Birkenstock 季度销售额略低于预期
item.description: 德国凉鞋制造商 Birkenstock 周四公布的第三季度营收略低于预期，美洲地区销售增长放缓，但该公司表示，已做好准备应对美国对欧洲进口商品征收 15%关税的影响。【原文：German sandal maker Birkenstock narrowly missed third-quarter revenue expectations and reported slower sales growth in the Americas region on Thursday, but said it was well placed to manage the impact of the 15% U.S. tariff on European imports.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：美联储主席戴利称下月降息似乎没有必要
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，旧金山联储主席玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）反驳了在美联储 9 月会议上降息 50 个基点的必要性。【原文：San Francisco Fed President Mary Daly has pushed back against the need for an interest rate cut of 50 basis points at the Federal Reserve's September meeting, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧元区 6 月工业萎缩超预期，但国内生产总值保持稳定
item.description: 欧元区 6 月份的工业产值下滑幅度超过预期，尽管第二季度的整体经济增长保持稳定，这对 20 国货币联盟仍能抵御全球贸易战影响的观点提出了挑战。【原文：Euro zone industrial output dipped more than expected in June even as overall economic growth held up in the second quarter, challenging views that the 20 nation currency union remains resilient to the fallout from a global trade war.】

item.title: 进口商努力转售陷入中国关税战火的加拿大菜籽粕
item.description: 三位贸易消息人士称，在中国政府对富含蛋白质的加拿大菜籽粕征收高额进口关税后，进口商正在努力转售运抵中国的几批加拿大菜籽粕。【原文：Importers are struggling to resell several cargoes of Canadian canola meal that arrived in China after Beijing imposed hefty import tariffs on the protein-rich ingredient, three trade sources said.】

item.title: 供应增加，夏季需求结束，油价结构收窄，溢价下降
item.description: 交易商和分析师周四表示，随着夏季需求高峰的结束，中东、拉丁美洲和欧洲的产量不断增加，与未来几个月相比，全球即时基准油价的溢价正在下降。【原文：Premiums for prompt benchmark oil prices globally are falling compared with those in future months on rising output from the Middle East, Latin America and Europe, just as peak summer demand ends, traders and analysts said on Thursday.】

item.title: 安托法加斯塔上半年核心盈利增长近 60
item.description: 智利矿业公司安托法加斯塔（Antofagasta）周四公布，由于铜产量和销售量增加，半年核心盈利增长近 60%。【原文：Chilean miner Antofagasta posted a nearly 60% increase in half-year core earnings on Thursday, on higher production and sales of its copper.】

item.title: 嘉士伯上半年业绩不及预期，警告今年将面临困境
item.description: 周四，嘉士伯未能达到半年利润和销量预期，这家丹麦啤酒酿造商警告称，预计 2025 年余下时间的消费环境不会有任何改善。【原文：Carlsberg missed half-year profit and volume forecasts on Thursday, with the Danish brewer warning it does not expect any improvement in the consumer environment for the rest of 2025.】

item.title: 赫伯罗特上半年净利润下降 3.1%，下调全年最高预期
item.description: 德国集装箱航运公司赫伯罗特（Hapag-Lloyd）是全球第五大集装箱航运公司，该公司周四公布上半年净收入下降 3.1%，降至 7.09 亿欧元（8.29 亿美元），并以地缘政治不确定性为由下调了全年盈利预期区间的上限。【原文：German container shipping company Hapag-Lloyd , the world's fifth largest, on Thursday posted a 3.1% decline in its first-half net income to 709 million euros ($829 million) and brought down the top of its full-year earnings forecast range, citing geopolitical uncertainty.】

item.title: WhatsApp 称俄罗斯试图封杀它
item.description: WhatsApp 表示，俄罗斯之所以试图封锁其服务，是因为 Meta Platforms 旗下的社交媒体消息应用为人们提供了安全通信的权利，并誓言将继续努力在俄罗斯提供加密服务。【原文：WhatsApp said Russia was trying to block its services because the social media messaging app owned by Meta Platforms offered people's right to secure communication, and vowed to continue trying to make encrypted services available in Russia.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发不确定性，蒂森克虏伯下调销售展望和投资额
item.description: 德国企业集团蒂森克虏伯（Thyssenkrupp）周四下调了全年投资和销售展望，指责美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的进口关税扰乱了全球汽车、机械和建材贸易，导致产品需求疲软。【原文：German conglomerate Thyssenkrupp cut its full-year outlook for investments and sales on Thursday, blaming weak demand for its products as U.S. President Donald Trump's import tariffsdisrupt global trade of autos, machines and building materials.】

item.title: 机器人技术和木材能否解决英国的住房问题？
item.description: 由人工智能控制的巨大机械臂在英国牛津郡的一家大型工厂里滑行，用木材（世界上最古老的建筑材料之一）制作建筑框架。【原文：Gigantic robot arms controlled by artificial intelligence glide around a vast factory in Oxfordshire, England, making building frames from timber, one of the world's oldest construction materials.】

item.title: 聚焦："特斯拉之耻 "绕过挪威，尽管马斯克的政治立场使销量猛增
item.description: 和许多挪威人一样，埃斯彭-莱斯霍尔姆最近并不喜欢埃隆-马斯克，他对这位世界首富在右翼政治中的迷失感到不安。【原文：Like many Norwegians, Espen Lysholm is not a fan of Elon Musk these days, uncomfortable with the world's richest man's lurch into right-wing politics.】

item.title: 投资者对欧洲央行利率采取 "长期看高 "的观点
item.description: 投资者对欧元区利率 "长期走高 "环境的定价越来越高，3 月份可能的降息被视为借贷利率回升至 2% 以上之前的暂时昙花一现。【原文：Investors are increasingly pricing in a "higher for longer" interest rate environment in the euro zone, with a potential cut in March seen as a temporary blip before borrowing rates climb back above 2%.】

item.title: 早间竞价比特币加入风险狂欢
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 彭博新闻社：中印两国正就时隔五年恢复边境贸易进行谈判
item.description: 彭博新闻社周四援引熟悉此事的新德里官员的话称，印度和中国正在讨论恢复时隔五年多的国内商品边境贸易。【原文：India and China are discussing resuming border trade of domestic goods after more than five years, Bloomberg News said on Thursday, citing officials in New Delhi familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：DeepSeek 因华为芯片问题推迟推出新人工智能模型
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，中国人工智能公司DeepSeek在使用华为芯片训练失败后推迟了其新模型的发布，这凸显了中国政府推动取代美国技术的局限性。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence company DeepSeek has delayed the release of its new model after failing to train it using Huawei's chips, highlighting the limits of Beijing's push to replace U.S. technology, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国将探索与巴基斯坦在关键矿产和碳氢化合物方面的合作
item.description: 国务卿马可-鲁比奥在国务院于巴基斯坦独立日发表的声明中表示，华盛顿期待与巴基斯坦在关键矿产和碳氢化合物方面开展合作。【原文：Secretary of State Marco Rubio said Washington looked forward to exploring cooperation with Pakistan on critical minerals and hydrocarbons, with his comments coming in a statement issued by the State Department on Pakistan's Independence Day.】

item.title: 美联储降息鼓点敲响，美元回落；亚洲股市喘息
item.description: 周四，美元承压，交易员们纷纷押注美联储将在下个月继续降息，推动比特币创下历史新高，而地区股市的强劲反弹也为美元提供了喘息的机会。【原文：The U.S. dollar was under pressure on Thursday as traders piled into wagers that the Federal Reserve will resume cutting interest rates next month, powering Bitcoin to a record high, while a blistering rally in regional stocks took a breather.】
